biotools.summary: JSON payloads and ontologies become widely adopted in the life science community, validation of ontologies described in JSON documents becomes ever more important. ELIXIR biovalidator is a custom extension to existing JSON Schema syntax to include ontology validation and an implementation based on the Ajv javascript library

bioschemas.name: biovalidator
bioschemas.summary: JSON payloads and ontologies become widely adopted in the life science community, validation of ontologies described in JSON documents becomes ever more important.
